name: Air Canada A320-211 [C-FFWN] Pushback, Taxi, and Takeoff from Montréal-Trudeau ᴴᴰ
description:
Air Canada's older A320 seats are fantastic! They haven't updated the cabin to the newer slimline seats, and although those are fine, you can't go wrong with 3 inches of padding. Here we have C-FFWN, a now 27 year old A320 departing Montréal Pierre Elliot Trudeau International Airport for Calgary International Airport back in September. C-FFWN was operating AC1145, one of many direct flights between YUL and YYC, and is seen here pushing back, taxiing, and departing runway 24R with a fantastic view of the terminal and then climbing away over the Québec countryside. Enjoy this comprehensive departure video!

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Engines: 2x CFMI CFM56-5A1
Registration: C-FFWN
Route: Montréal-Trudeau (YUL) - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: Air Canada 1145
Runway used: 24R
Local Time: 0800
Seat: 25A
